title: Trace the Trigger
summary: Reveal the moment your loop starts.
description: Every loop has a trigger — a moment, phrase, or sensation that starts the spiral. This quest helps you find it and name it.

flow.\ud83d\udd0d Step 1: Recall the Loop: Pick a moment recently when the loop you named started running.
flow.\ud83e\udde0 Step 2: Message the Mirror: Send: 'The trigger might have been: [what was said, felt, or feared]'
flow.\ud83c\udf00 Step 3: Ask the Pattern: 'What emotion or belief tends to follow this?'

optional_recast: Try this again with a different loop later.
absence_response: No trigger traced today. Sometimes the pattern needs space.
notes: The trigger isn’t the enemy — it’s a signal flare.
Most triggers are tied to old emotions, not current truths.
Naming the starting point helps you change the path.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: What core emotion might this trigger pattern represent?
amplification.loop_signal: Track common words and sensations in triggers.
amplification.miss_response: 🎭 The trigger remained hidden today. That’s okay. Awareness is still forming.
